bank - package bank
 

C

createNewPass(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Sets a new encrypted password and salt for user account in the userPwdMap.

G

generateTransactionOTP(int, int) - Method in class bank.Security
Used to generate a one-time user password specific to the user's account for transaction validations.

H

hashPassword(String, byte[]) - Method in class bank.Security
Converts plain-text passString arg into an encrypted string by adding a cryptographic salt to the plain-text and then hashing it

M

S

Security - Class in bank
Security class is in charge of the login process and authentication services for bank transactions.
Security(int) - Constructor for class bank.Security
Constructor for security class called on Bank initialisation.

V

validateOTP(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if the input argument matches the one found in OTP hashmap, otpMap Method has 3 conditions: Valid User ID, Non-expired OTP and Correct One-time password value If any of the three conditions fail, return a False value.
validatePassword(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if input password matches password stored in password Hashmap, userPwdMap.
